messages.subject: Re: use your imagination now
messages.msgSnippet: When i first saw this on the message boasr, Rich, i was at a loss. now with imagination ... eggplant.-- don t really see it, but .,, i do like the idea of
messages.messageBody:
When i first saw this on the message boasr, Rich, i was at a loss.
now with imagination ... eggplant.-- don't really see it, but .,,

i do like the idea of stylized dragon. it is a fine tsuba. simple
and heavy looking. like it a lot.

doug e.
-- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "bungotakadasword"

messages.subject: use your imagination now
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.image-hosting.net/images/messageboard/retalt/duplicate_4660_tsuba.jpg This appeared on my message board, apart from being upside down, I have no
messages.messageBody:
http://www.image-hosting.net/images/messageboard/retalt/duplicate_4660_tsuba.jpg

This appeared on my message board, apart from being upside down, I have no idea about it. I thought the design looked plant based, maybe like a bean runner or something like that and it sort of looks Owari in style.

any thoughts here ??

Rich
